description: This client type represents a Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) owner who needs efficient banking solutions for their business. They are looking for ways to streamline their financial operations, manage cash flow, and access credit facilities. YONO's integrated platform offers them a convenient way to handle various banking needs in one place, including fund transfers, payments, and account management. They are particularly interested in digital loan options to support their business growth and expansion. They require secure and reliable banking services that can handle high transaction volumes and provide detailed reporting. They appreciate features like UPI for business transactions and the ability to access banking services from anywhere, anytime. They need solutions that are tailored to the specific needs of their business and help them improve their financial performance.
